name: Clash of the Elements! (Skill Card)
text:
Generic / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can pay 2000 LP and declare 2 Attributes; Until the End Phase, monsters with the first Attribute have their ATK doubled against monsters with the second Attribute during damage calculation.
You can only use this Skill twice per Duel.
